web_search.title: Moody's Corporation (MCO) Latest Stock News & Headlines
web_search.snippet: Moody's will release Q4 and full year 2025 results before NYSE trading on Wednesday, February 18, 2026. Analysts expect strong earnings growth. MCO named #1 in 2026 Chartis RiskTech100 for fourth consecutive year.

web_search.title: Moody's and FactSet stocks slide on S&P Global's weak 2026 outlook
web_search.snippet: Moody's Corporation faces challenges following S&P Global's weak 2026 outlook, resulting in a 5% stock drop. The stock fell 5% alongside other financial data companies as investors reacted to disappointing guidance from industry peer S&P Global.

web_search.title: Moody's Corporation $MCO Shares Bought by Principal Financial Group Inc.
web_search.snippet: Principal Financial Group Inc. acquired shares of Moody's Corporation. Institutional buying activity signals confidence in MCO's long-term prospects.

web_search.query: Moody's MCO analyst rating target price 2026
web_search.title: Moody's (MCO) Stock Forecast & Analyst Price Targets
web_search.snippet: Based on 19 analysts, the average 12-month price target is $571.79 (high: $660, low: $460). Consensus rating: Buy from 17 analysts. 1 Strong Buy, 13 Buy, 5 Hold ratings. Average target price $558.56 representing 34.5% upside.

web_search.query: Moody's MCO analyst rating target price 2026
web_search.title: Moody's (NYSE:MCO) Shares Gap Down - What's Next?
web_search.snippet: MCO shares gapped down amid sector-wide pressure. Short-term price targets from 18 analysts average $503.17, ranging from $385 to $570.

web_search.snippet: TipRanks analyst consensus on MCO with detailed price target forecasts and rating history.

web_search.title: Moody's Corporation Common Stock (MCO) Earnings Report Dates & Earnings Forecasts
web_search.snippet: Q4 2025 EPS forecast: $3.44. Analysts expect diluted EPS of $3.41, up 30.2% from $2.62 in year-ago quarter. Earnings release scheduled for February 18, 2026 before NYSE open.

web_search.title: What to Expect From Moody's Next Quarterly Earnings Report
web_search.snippet: Moody's will release fourth-quarter earnings soon. Analysts anticipate double-digit bottom-line growth. Q3 2025 saw record quarterly revenue exceeding $2 billion with adjusted diluted EPS of $3.92, a 22% increase YoY.

web_search.title: Moody's Corporation Reports Results for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024; Sets Outlook for 2025
web_search.snippet: Official Moody's IR press release for Q4 and FY2024 results with 2025 outlook guidance. Key reference for year-over-year comparison.

web_search.query: Moody's vs S&P Global SPGI credit rating market share
web_search.title: Big Three (credit rating agencies) - Wikipedia
web_search.snippet: S&P Global, Moody's, and Fitch Ratings are the Big Three credit rating agencies. Combined S&P and Moody's hold ~80% market share of ~$12 trillion in annual global rated debt issuance. Fitch holds ~20%.

web_search.query: Moody's vs S&P Global SPGI credit rating market share
web_search.title: Better Buy: Moody's vs. S&P Global
web_search.snippet: Comparison of MCO vs SPGI as investments. S&P Global has ~50% credit rating market share vs Moody's ~31%. SPGI has diversified into broad data business while MCO doubled down on credit and risk analytics.

web_search.query: Moody's vs S&P Global SPGI credit rating market share
web_search.title: Comparing the 2 Big Ratings Agencies: Moody's and S&P Global
web_search.snippet: Detailed comparison of the two dominant credit rating agencies including business models, revenue mix, and competitive positioning.

web_search.query: Moody's CEO Rob Fauber management strategy
web_search.title: Robert Fauber - CEO, Moody's Corporation
web_search.snippet: Rob Fauber has served as CEO since 2021. 19-year career at Moody's. Responsible for establishing Analytics business (now >50% of revenues). Focus: enterprise-wide technology-enabled innovation, risk assessment evolution, customer expansion.

web_search.query: Moody's CEO Rob Fauber management strategy
web_search.title: CEO Speaker Series With Rob Fauber of Moody's - Council on Foreign Relations
web_search.snippet: Fauber discusses evolution of risk management and how economic instability, geopolitical uncertainty, extreme weather events intersect to create increasingly interconnected and complex risk environment.

web_search.query: MCO credit rating industry outlook regulation 2026
web_search.title: Moody's Credit Outlook: 15 September 2025
web_search.snippet: Moody's expects sector earnings in 2026 will expand around rate of inflation. 7 of 17 industry sector outlooks are negative, just 2 positive (aerospace/defense and tech). MCO and SPGI face AI-driven fears with MCO favored for cleaner outlook and regulatory moat.

web_search.query: MCO credit rating industry outlook regulation 2026
web_search.title: 10 financial regulatory changes for 2026
web_search.snippet: Financial regulatory landscape changes expected in 2026 including anti-money laundering regime updates and Senior Managers Certification Regime changes. Looser regulatory regime looming per Fitch's 2026 outlook.

web_search.query: Moody's Analytics growth data analytics revenue 2026
web_search.title: Moody's (MCO) Moodys Analytics Revenue Breakdown
web_search.snippet: MA segment ~$3.5B TTM revenue (Q3 2025). Decision Solutions: $1.64B TTM (+10.7% YoY). Research and Insights: $976M TTM (+7.4%). Data and Information: $895M TTM (+6.5%). Decision Solutions nearly doubled from $314M (Q4 2021) to $424M (Q3 2025) quarterly.

web_search.query: Moody's Analytics growth data analytics revenue 2026
web_search.title: Moody's Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates on Y/Y Revenue Growth
web_search.snippet: MA revenues rose 9.4% YoY to $909M in Q3, driven by 11% Decision Solutions growth, 7% Research and Insights rise, and 9% Data & Information rise. Moody's projects revenues to increase in high-single-digit % range for 2026 with MA adjusted operating margin of 33%.
